name: Flappy Man
description: Flappy men like james are searching for better lives in a new country. They want to escape from the king in the jungle who sends patrols to burn their homes. The king and his dangerous quests are no match for the endless runner of endless fun. Jame tries to get from point A to point B. Try this game for yourself. Cut your own path through the jungle as you pass through countless obstacles, evade the flying
